thread.title: Ghana FA bans Dreams FC striker Cudjoe Mensah/Daniel Gozar for one year for registration irregularities
thread.title_full: Ghana FA bans Dreams FC striker Cudjoe Mensah/Daniel Gozar for one year for registration irregularities

title: Ghana FA bans Dreams FC striker Cudjoe Mensah/Daniel Gozar for one year for registration irregularities
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 00:10 CET Ghana FA bans Dreams FC striker Cudjoe Mensah/Daniel Gozar for one year for registration irregularities - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The Ghana Disciplinary Committee has banned Dreams FC player Cudjoe Mensah/Daniel Gozar for one football season after being charged with two counts of misconduct. 
Mensah was alleged to have registered for two clubs in two different league divisions of the Ghana Football Association under different names (Daniel Gozar and Cudjoe Mensah respectively) using different date of births in the 2013-2014 football season contrary to Article 26(3)(b) and 35(12) of the GFA General Regulations. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
